definition: to remarry (of a widow)/second wife/qin and se 琴瑟[qin2 se4], two string instruments as a symbol of marital harmony
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)

Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
to take refuge in religious life
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
